welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Converse, the charming city known for its friendly locals, beautiful parks, and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our wonderful city has to offer during your visit!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at San Antonio International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at San Antonio International Airport, primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stinson Municipal Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Stinson Municipal Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at New Braunfels Regional Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: For those traveling by private jet, the private terminal at New Braunfels Regional Airport offers a luxurious and efficient experience.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
